document.full_text: takeda pharmaceutical is in talks to buy its swiss rival nycomed for up to $14 billion, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said thursday.
document.title: takeda in talks to buy nycomed for as much as $14 billion
lines_and_colors: takeda pharmaceutical is in talks to buy its swiss rival nycomed for up to $14 billion, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said thursday.
